creator: mail@danielbruessler.de
text:
page:
http://lenya.apache.org/docu20/installation20/install20.html

* The first li item after "Prerequisites": remove the linebreak before the item "Java 2 Platform, Standard Edition"
* Change version from 1.4 to 5: Prerequisites -- Java 2 Platform, Standard Edition version 1.5 (or 1.4.2+, not version 6). 
* Installation with Apache Tomcat: Change Version from 1.4 to 5: "Get Apache Tomcat for JDK 5 -- Lenya is developed and tested with Tomcat 5.5; it is assumed in the following instructions, and we highly recommend it. Tomcat 4.0.0+, 4.1.24+, 5.0.18+, 5.5.0+, 6.0+ should work too."
* Fix the broken link: Get it from here: http://tomcat.apache.org/download-55.cgi
* Fix the broken link: Install Apache Tomcat -- See Tomcat 5.0 Setup: http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/setup.html
* Build Lenya Unix: If the build fails set umask 0002 This sets the default folder permissions to 775 and default file permissions to 664.


page:
http://lenya.apache.org/docu12x/installation12/install.html
* Prerequisites -- Recommended: Create a directory: Change version from cocoon-2.1.7 to cocoon-2.1.9 because this version is set in the cocoon-configuration-file! (four times on the page: "-- cocoon-2.1.7/", "inside cocoon-2.1.7/", "version: 2.1.7", 2x "../cocoon-2.1.7 relative to Lenya"

page:
http://lenya.apache.org/docu20/installation20/install20.html

* 1. Standalone Installation (using the built-in Jetty) -- Configure Lenya: You need to set your PATH environment variable to $COCOON_HOME/tools/bin because in that folder are the current version of ant and all other tools what are needed for the build
